"A.P.241/4/2": "While access to the ARKS Ship from Earth was a small scale operation, it's surprising that it's been going on for almost 12 years."
"Furthermore, starting 2 years ago, they have shifted towards sending people like Hitsugi, who can directly come here to conduct investigations."
"12 years ago... That was 2016, when Ether based communication technology was established, and ESC-A dominated across the world."
"And 2 years ago... 2 years ago? I don't remember any major incidents that happened on Earth..."
"That cause is likely to be on our side, rather than on Earth. Both 12 years ago and 2 years ago, albeit not on Earth, our world faced a huge peril."
"The incident that occurred 12 years ago and 2 years ago. <%me>, do you remember?"
"While that's also true, I was referring to the [Profound Darkness] being the main trigger."
"Yes, that's correct. As you can see how the situation has changed, [Profound Darkness] was the main trigger."
"It appears that someone on Earth has detected the timing of [Profound Darkness]'s resurrection - hence, they're probably trying to chaange their approach."
"Although it's unknown how these two are related, we're starting to see the answers as we go through the intel that we have."
"Having said that, we can only go by guesses. Sorry, if only I knew more about this..."
"No problem, even guesses are more than enough. It means that the dots are starting to connect to each other."
